The claim originated from a right: wing radio host, Hal Turner, who is a convicted felon and known for making unsupported claims.
Turner stated that witnesses reported se: rotor aircraft and quickly moving into the building.
Witnesses also claimed that a significan: rotor aircraft were seen circling the grounds of CIA Headquarters and parked on the grass around the building.
